param.name: fbConf_wysiwyg_label
param.label: Use WYSIWYG editor for element labels

param.name: fbConf_alter_existing_db_cols
param.label: Alter field types
param.description: DEPRECAITED - USE TABLE'S OWN SETTINGS FOR THIS FEATURE. If no selected then fabrik will not alter database table field types, when saving elements. If yes selected then fabrik will update your database table structure to assure maximum compatibility

param.name: remove_tables_on_unistall
param.label: Remove tables on uninstall
param.description: drop tables that contain data collected by fabrik when unistalling fabrik

param.name: usefabrik_mootools
param.label: Mootools version
param.description: If 1.2 selected then fabrik will attempt to replace Joomla's version of mootools with the latest mootools version - note this may stop other modules from working on fabrik pages. If none selected then we don't load mootools at all - only choose this option if your Joomla template manually includes mootools

param.name: use_mediabox
param.label: Use mediabox instead of slimbox (supports Flash, but requires Fabrik mootools)

param.name: merge_js
param.label: Merged JS files
param.description: If yes selected then fabrik will take all individual js files required for a page and merge them into one longer JS file. This has the advantage of speeding up page load times, but may need to be turned off when developing

param.name: compress_js
param.label: Compress merged JS file
param.description: If you decided to merge the JS files you can also decide if you want to compress them. WARNING: Currently the packer method creates an unusable JS file, its option is here for testing as it produces higher compression rates

param.name: spoofcheck_on_formsubmission
param.label: Spoof check on form submission
param.description: If yes selected then fabrik will use Joomla's spoof check functionality when processing forms. Turn off if you want to post data via a URL

param.name: use_wip
param.label: Use Works-in-Progress
param.description: Enable or disable any features in Fabrik which are still considered 'works in progress'. Although WiP code shouldn't cause errors, you should only enable this settings if there is some WiP you need
